name: Camarones a la Diabla (Mexican Deviled Prawns)
author: aidacontadora
summary: Don't take the word deviled lightly! These prawns are cooked in a super spicy sauce made with ketchup and chipotle chiles in adobo. Serve with white rice and avocado slices.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
⅓ cup chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
1 tablespoon soy-based liquid seasoning (such as Maggi®)
directions: Whisk 1/4 cup butter, lime juice, olive oil, spring onion, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Add prawns and toss to coat well with marinade
Melt remaining 1/4 cup butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Add prawns with marinade; cook until pink, 3 to 5 minutes
Combine ketchup, chipotle peppers, liquid seasoning, and salt in a blender; blend until smooth
Pour ketchup mixture over prawns and cook, stirring constantly, until sauce comes to a boil
Reduce heat to low and simmer until sauce thickens, 3 to 5 minutes
